text:
*360Learning is hiring a UK Content Lead* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

The Job:

As our UK Content Lead, you’ll be the owner of our organic pipeline growth. Together with our UK Head of Demand Generation, you’ll work on creating and distributing content for the whole funnel to build our presence as the market leader in the UK. From content localization to distribution, you’ll be the go-to person for all things content for the UK.

- Build and grow our UK content marketing efforts to support our organic pipeline growth
- Work with the US content team to produce and localize high-quality content for the UK in all formats (blog posts, ebooks, sales docs, webinars, videos)
- Build content funnels with the Demand Generation team to ensure content drives business growth
- Identify UK distribution channels and co-marketing partners to grow our brand and audience in the UK
- Identify and build a community of L&D leader, analysts, and influencers in the UK

Skills/profile: 

- 4+ years of hands-on content marketing or inbound marketing experience
- Comprehensive knowledge and understanding of the UK SaaS/EdTech market
- Proven track record of managing a blog and success in driving full-funnel organic growth/lead generation
- Knowledge of B2B SaaS marketing and the L&D industry is a big plus. Genuine interest in the space helps.
- Experience in creating multimedia content is another big plus (audio, video, visual designs)
- Happy to work remotely and believer in our culture, as explained here: <https://www.swipe.to/5618x>

Compensation: 
- 60-70k GBP, 8% variable

*To apply, send an email to:* `<mailto:joei.chan@360learning.com|joei.chan@360learning.com>`
Ping me for more info! :raised_hands: And if you need a sneak peek of our company culture: <https://360learning.com/studio/onboarding-joei>

attachments.title: Onboarding Joei - our content director | 360Learning
attachments.text: What really happens when you join a hyper-growth tech startup? Follow our new content director Joei through her first 90 days of onboarding with our original 13 episodes of unscripted docu-series.

elements.text: And if you need a sneak peek of our company culture:

text:
*360Learning is hiring a Social Media Lead* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

360Learning is looking for a passionate Social Media Lead that will take our social media content and strategy to the next level.

In this role, you’ll live and breathe social media, come up with creative social media campaigns, provide guidance on the latest and most annoying change to the social media algorithms, combine our strong brand vision with the latest trending conversations and pop-cultural references and make us THE company to follow in the L&D and HR world. 

The job: 

- Own our social media strategy. Come up with a one-of-a-kind social media strategy that will make us THE company to follow in the L&D and HR world, specifically on Instagram and Linkedin
- Bring our unique brand voice to life. Work with the rest of the content team to define our tone and copy approach on each social platform, and create guidelines to ensure consistency.
- Hands-on execution. Create and manage our social media publishing calendar, creating social images, videos, writing copy, clicking ‘publish’, replying to every comment, the nitty-gritty. 
- Analytics and reporting. Create and own weekly and monthly reports, and post-mortem of campaigns. Report on net new followers, post engagement, click-through-rates, and other goal achievements.

Skills/profile:

- 5+ years of social media marketing experience, with a track record of building memorable social media communities 
- Passion for social media, pop culture, and trending conversations
- A great sense of humor and ability to talk to people with ease
- Proficient in basic video shooting, editing (e.g. Instagram stories) 
- Esthetic eye for what looks good and basic graphic design (Canva is ok ;)
- Creative but organized. Good with deadlines and managing multiple projects
- Comfortable with numbers and analytics
- Fast learner and ability to digest complex concepts and ideas into visual formats


To apply:

- Submit a non-traditional cover lever in a social media-friendly format (Tweets, IG story, Reels, carousel posts, go crazy!) and tell us: 
- Who you are and what we should know about you
- Why you’ll be great at this role
- What you like about 360Learning
- Your favorite social media accounts on Instagram and Linkedin
- Provide links to your social media accounts or accounts you’re managing 

Full JD here: <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Iehu1T5jXzMMQ8HXylgGw1ChRMJJ7PEJXV97Qqyw8HQ/edit?usp=sharing>

*To apply, send an email to:* `<mailto:joei.chan@360learning.com|joei.chan@360learning.com>`
Working with Joei is the best! Highly recommend!

elements.text: Working with Joei is the best! Highly recommend!

text:
*Webflow is hiring a Content Marketing Manager* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

We're looking for someone to come help us create content at Webflow. You'll mainly be writing and editing high-quality articles about design, no-code, and Webflow for our blog. Would love to find someone that knows how to use Webflow (at least a bit!) and can speak to our customers about what they create. Bonus if you know about content distribution and analysis. 

*Learn more and apply here:* <https://bit.ly/3g6CaS6>

<@U01DE3REJUC>
Hey <@U010JU2GTND> - This role sounds right up my alley. I have a few questions about Soapbox and your personal experience. Would it be ok if I DM’d you?
